section.name: networkExplorer.json Example
section.p: This example shows a simple web application definition.
section.source: { "id": "network_explorer", "name": "Network Explorer", "shortInfo": "Use Network Explorer to search and retrieve all Network Configuration Data. The returned data can be grouped into Collections or Saved searches to facilitate sharing and reuse.", "path": "/#networkExplorer", "type": "web", "version": 1, "openInNewWindow": false "resources": [ "topologySearchService", "searchExecutor", "topologyCollectionsService", "modelInformationService" ], "groups": [ { "id": "Tools", "name": "Tools" } ] }
